label: 八朔
本: Kaempfer's Japan:  Tokugawa Culture Observed . University of Hawai'i Press . 1999
著者: Kaempfer, Engelbert; ed. trans. annot. by Beatrice M. Bodart-Bailey
説明文: lit.: the first day of the eighth month. On this day the farmers presented some of their first rice crop to their superiors, and the day became one of giving presents.
